> In how many ways can we get a sum of 3 or a sum of 4 when two dice are rolled?

We can get a sum of 3 in 2 ways: $\{(1,2), (2,1)\}$ and sum of 4 in 3 ways: $\{(1,3), (3,1), (2,2)\}$ for the total of 5 ways
